last_episode_to_air.name: Cook Off Championship
last_episode_to_air.overview: In the Season Finale of Bong Appetit: Cook Off, the judges choose three chefs to return to the kitchen to fight for the crown. N.O.R.E & Michael Voltaggio guest judge.

name: Bong Appétit
overview: In seasons 1 & 2, Abdullah Saeed throws elaborate cannabis dinner parties with notable chefs preparing multi-course infused meals. Starting with season 3, B Real, Vanessa Lavorato and Miguel Trinidad host a culinary competition that tests a chef's ability to utilize the ultimate ingredient: cannabis.

seasons.name: Season 3
seasons.overview: Season 3 switches to reality mode as B Real, Vanessa Lavorato and Miguel Trinidad host a culinary competition that tests a chef's ability to utilize the ultimate ingredient: cannabis. In each episode, three chefs go head-to-head to see who can create the best infused dishes.

episodes.name: Molecular Marijuana
episodes.overview: Abdullah learns to make high-end hash and invites chef Marcel Vigneron to prepare cannabutter-basted beef cheek, weed-smoked tuna, and potleaf juice dippin dots.

episodes.name: Hazy Holiday Dinner
episodes.overview: Abdullah and his team put weed into a variety of classic holiday eats, make a triple-infused holiday popcorn tin, and smoke a giant blunt shaped like a Christmas tree.

episodes.name: Fiesta Del Fuego
episodes.overview: Abdullah throws a cannabis fiesta with Wes Avila, owner of LA's favorite taco truck, with three weed-infused tacos and a marijuana agua fresca.

episodes.name: Baked Bedouin Birthday
episodes.overview: For Abdullah's birthday, Ry and Vanessa throw a Bedouin-themed party and help chef Deb Mikhail stuff entire flame-roasted chickens with weed; Ras G performs.

episodes.name: Tour de Terpenes
episodes.overview: Chef Taylor Persh cooks infused beef tartar, dumplings, and cream puffs using a variety of strains.

episodes.name: Marijuana Murder Mystery
episodes.overview: Abdullah hosts a murder-mystery-masquerade dinner with chef Courtney McBroom preparing marijuana-infused New Orleans cuisine and Vanessa makes pralinella-terpene chocolates.

episodes.name: Kimchi + Kush
episodes.overview: Abdullah invites innovative Korean chef Deuki Hong to raid the weed pantry and make keef-breaded chicken wings and infused kimchi-Spam stew.

episodes.name: Ganja Grandma
episodes.overview: Abdullah heads to Northern California and reunites with world famous ganja grandma, Nonna. They prepare a cannabis dinner full of classic infusions.

episodes.name: Filipino Flower Feast
episodes.overview: Abdullah enlists an experienced cannabis chef to cook up a weed-infused Kamayan Feast.

episodes.name: Smoking Sativa S'mores
episodes.overview: In the first-season finale, Abdullah travels to Joshua Tree National Park, where chef Jake Francis cooks infused-pork dishes over an open flame.

episodes.name: High Thai Food
episodes.overview: Abdullah throws a Thai dinner party with chef Louis Tikaram, who prepares a green curry with six cannabis infusions, CBD rice porridge, and terpene mango sticky rice.

episodes.name: South Central Cannabis Cuisine
episodes.overview: Trap Kitchen chefs Spank and News join Abdullah, Ry, and Vanessa to prepare their famous cannabis-infused pineapple bowls for comedian and Black Jesus actor Slink Johnson.

episodes.name: Texas BBQ On Weed
episodes.overview: Abdullah invites barbecue legend Kevin Bludso to cannabis-smoke slabs of pork from pigs raised on hemp and slather them with infused BBQ sauce.

episodes.name: Marijuana Mother's Day Feast
episodes.overview: Abdullah and Ry's moms visit the house for a special cannabis-infused Mother's Day brunch prepared by Sarah and Sara from Kismet and a spa day with CBD massages.

episodes.name: Pot Infused Pizza Party
episodes.overview: Abdullah and Frank Pinello throw an infused-pizza-and-beer party and invite pro skaters David Gravette, Kyle Walker and Jeron Wilson to skate in the house.

episodes.name: Cruelty Free Cannabis Cuisine
episodes.overview: Abdullah, Ry and Vanessa team up with Afro-vegan chef Bryant Terry to put together an infused-vegan menu for former pro-baller John Salley and Claire and Jona from Yacht.

episodes.name: Havana Hydro Feast
episodes.overview: Abdullah and the team bring chef Melissa Fernandez to the Bong Appetit kitchen to prepare Cuban classics with a cannabis twist. Ry and Abdullah learn to roll Cuban cigar blunts.

episodes.name: Grow to Table Cuisine
episodes.overview: Abdullah and the Bong Appetit squad head to a ranch in Malibu for a cannabis-infused feast made with foraged ingredients and prepared by Journeyman chef David Wilcox.

episodes.name: Pakistani Pot Pakoras
episodes.overview: Abdullah invites star Pakistani chef Fatima Ali to prepare remixed traditional dishes for a cannabis-infused Desi dinner, including CBD pakoras and THC kababs.

episodes.name: Weed Infused Japanese Food
episodes.overview: Chef Yoya Takahashi takes over the Bong Appetit kitchen to learn how to infuse a few Japanese izakaya classics. We even a get a lesson in using sushi techniques for blunt rolling.

episodes.name: Ganja Game Day
episodes.overview: Abdullah and the team work with chef Melissa D'Elia to put together an infused meal for former pro athletes who use cannabis in their fitness regimes.

episodes.name: Greek Style Ganja Dinner
episodes.overview: Abdullah and the team work with chef Cat Cora at the Bong Appetit house to prepare a cannabis-infused Greek dinner. Kenny Scharf and Xzibit come to dinner.

episodes.name: Tandoori Toke Fest
episodes.overview: Abdullah and the team fire up the tandoor oven with Badmaash chefs Nakul and Arjun Mahendro to throw an infused Indian dinner party with smokeable puri.

episodes.name: Pothead Sleepover Party
episodes.overview: Abdullah and the team throw a slumber party at the Bong Appetit house with Love and Salt chef Rebecca Merhej, who makes tasty treats including the world's greatest weed brownie.

episodes.name: Infused Vietnamese Cuisine
episodes.overview: Blind MasterChef winner Christine Ha joins Abdullah and the team for an infused Vietnamese dinner. Reggie Watts and other comedians come to dinner.

episodes.name: Cannabis Coconut Stew
episodes.overview: Abdullah and crew invite Brazilian chef Natalia Pereira from downtown LA restaurant Woodspoon to cook traditional dishes infused with cannabis.

episodes.name: Halloweed Party
episodes.overview: Abdullah, Ry, and Vanessa bring back their favorite chefs, the Badmaash brothers, Natalia Pereira, and David Wilcox for a Halloween dinner of spooky infused dishes.

episodes.name: Smoke Your Greens
episodes.overview: Abdullah invites health-focused chef Jasmine Shimoda to prepare the most balanced cannabis-infused meal to date. Fitness models join the team for dinner and yoga afterward.

episodes.name: Kosher Kush Cooking
episodes.overview: Abdullah and the team invite Jewish chef Joan Nathan to the Bong Appetit house to prepare traditional Shabbat dishes infused with cannabis. Dessert: candle rig dabs.

episodes.name: Wildest Weed Food Ever
episodes.overview: Bong Appetit crosses with wild cooking show Food Party. Thu Tran joins Abdullah and team to prepare some weird weed food. Also, some fun with the world's largest vape balloon.

episodes.name: poT Chef
episodes.overview: George Clinton brings the funk, B Real, Vanessa and Miguel bring the weed, and Top Chefs Dale Talde, Janine Booth and Kevin Gillespie bring infused meals in a clash of weed novices.

episodes.name: Legalize Marinara
episodes.overview: It's an Italian-American showdown between The Sopranos' Joe Gannascoli, Chef Brad Spence and Grandma Josephine Polito as they cook for the judges and guest Jarobi White.

episodes.name: Weed Chef Battle
episodes.overview: Cannabis chefs Leather Storrs, Cody Lindsay and Scott Durrah fire it up in the kitchen and do battle for B Real, Vanessa, Miguel and guest judge Wiz Khalifa.

episodes.name: Eggs & Bakin'
episodes.overview: LA chefs Nicole Rucker, Kat Turner and Ria Dolly Barbosa compete in making canna-breakfast for B Real, Vanessa, Miguel and rapper D.R.A.M. Artist Tom Brown infuses tiny waffles.

episodes.name: Puff, Puff, Pastry
episodes.overview: Cheech & Chong and gold medalist Hope Solo join B Real, Vanessa and Miguel as pastry chefs Lori Sauser, Jessica Craig and Luis Villavelazquez mix it up in a sugar battle.

episodes.name: Gochu-Bong
episodes.overview: Innovative Korean chefs Deuki Hong, Esther Choi and Han Hwang blow up the competition and prepare dishes for B Real, Vanessa, Miguel, the Dank Duchess and singer Lykke Li.

episodes.name: Latina Cochina
episodes.overview: Chefs Diana Sabater, Angelina Bastidas & Guadalupe Guerrero turn up the heat in a Latin cannabis cooking battle. Featuring guest-judge Corey Thomas.

episodes.name: Joint Effort
episodes.overview: Couples Lisa & Chris Binns and Anna & David Posey go head-to-head in a cannabis vape pairing food fight. Featuring comedian Doug Benson. Plus dabs!

episodes.name: Devil's Lettuce
episodes.overview: B Real, Vanessa and Miguel are joined by cannabis-loving drag queen Laganja Estranja as chefs Niki Ford, Unika Noiel, & Raul Medina battle in a plant-forward cooking competition.

episodes.name: Cook Off Championship
episodes.overview: In the Season Finale of Bong Appetit: Cook Off, the judges choose three chefs to return to the kitchen to fight for the crown. N.O.R.E & Michael Voltaggio guest judge.

3.name: Season 3
3.overview: Season 3 switches to reality mode as B Real, Vanessa Lavorato and Miguel Trinidad host a culinary competition that tests a chef's ability to utilize the ultimate ingredient: cannabis. In each episode, three chefs go head-to-head to see who can create the best infused dishes.
